All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
addNewBookController
This is a class called addNewBookController that contains all the event listener methods of the Add New Book UI page.There are some buttons on this page, and when the buttons get clicked, then the matching UI page will pop up.
AdminController
The AdminController contains all the event listener methods of the Admin System UI page.
AdminRow
The AdminRow class contains the data of the Admin table in the MySQL database.
Borrowed
The Borrowed class.
ConnectInfo
This is a class called ConnectInfo that contains the connection information for connecting to the databse.
DeleteLibrarianController
The DeleteLibrarianController contains methods to allow Admin users to delete Librarians.
holdBookController
This is a class called holdBookController that contains all the event listener methods of the Hold Book UI page.
issueBookController
This is a class called issueBookController, it has the UI page of issue books, and when the buttons get clicked, then the matching UI page will pop up.
LibrarianRow
The LibrarianRow class contains the data of the Librarian table in the MySQL database.
LoginController
The class called LoginController allows users to login by collecting an email and password from the user and validating their account by checking whether the provided email exists in the database and whether it is associated with the provided password using SQL select queries.
Main
The main class of the application which loads the app's login window.
MyController
This is a class called MyController that contains all the event listener methods of the Librarian System UI page.There are some buttons on this page, and when the buttons get clicked, then the matching UI page will pop up.
MysqlConnect
This is a class called MysqlConnect that contains the methods to manipulate the database, including select, update, delete, and insert methods
RegisterLibrarianController
The RegisterLibrarianController class allows Admin users to register new Librarians in the database.
RequestBook
The RequestBook class.
returnBookController
This is a class called returnBookController, it has the UI page of return books, and when the buttons get clicked, then the matching UI page will pop up.
Row
This is a class called Row that contains the data of the book table in the mysql database.
Row
The Row class.
StudentController
The StudentController class.
StudentRow
The StudentRow class contains the data of the students table in the MySQL database.
TestDBmanipulation
This is the JUNIT test class that tests all the entire guoyucao.db.manip.pack module, each method is tested by both success and fail situations.
TestLibrarianControllers
This is the JUNIT test class that tests all the entire Librarian module, each test case tests a controller of the Librarian module.
VerifyTool
This is a class called VerifyTool that contains the methods to verify the data that retrieved from the text field.
viewAllBooksController
This is a class called viewAllBooksController, it has the UI page of return books, and when the buttons get clicked, then the matching UI page will pop up.
ViewAllLibrariansController
The class called ViewAllLibrariansController allows an Admin user to display all Librarians in the database.
